products.name: iPhone 14 Pro
products.description: Experience the future with the iPhone 14 Pro, featuring an advanced A16 Bionic chip and ProMotion display. Capture stunning photos with the 48MP camera system.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.description: Sleek and powerful, the Galaxy S23 comes with a top-tier Snapdragon processor and ultra-clear AMOLED screen. Ideal for gaming and photography.

products.name: iPhone 14 max Pro
products.description: Large display and pro-level features make the iPhone 14 Max Pro perfect for creators. Advanced image processing and battery life to match.

products.name: iPhone 14 lite
products.description: A lighter, budget-friendly version of iPhone 14. Delivers fast performance with essential features in a stylish package.

products.name: OnePlus 11
products.description: The OnePlus 11 offers flagship performance at a competitive price. Enjoy smooth multitasking and a fast charging experience.

products.name: Google Pixel 7
products.description: Known for its excellent camera and clean Android experience, the Pixel 7 delivers fast updates and AI-powered features.

products.name: MacBook Air M2
products.description: The MacBook Air M2 is ultra-thin, lightweight, and incredibly powerful. Perfect for students and professionals on the go.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: Sleek design meets high performance in the Dell XPS 13. Enjoy a vibrant InfinityEdge display and fast SSD storage.

products.name: HP Spectre x360
products.description: This 2-in-1 laptop combines premium looks with flexibility. Convert it into a tablet for media, note-taking, and more.

products.name: Lenovo Yoga 7i
products.description: Lenovo Yoga 7i offers great versatility with its 360-degree hinge. Smooth performance for productivity and entertainment.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with superior sound quality. The XM5 is ideal for travelers and audiophiles alike.

products.name: Bose QC45
products.description: Enjoy comfort and clear sound with Bose QC45 headphones. Designed for long hours of listening with active noise cancellation.

products.name: JBL Tune 710BT
products.description: Affordable wireless headphones with JBL Pure Bass sound. Lightweight design and long battery life for daily use.

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro
products.description: With active noise cancellation and spatial audio, AirPods Pro deliver a premium wireless audio experience in a compact form.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
products.description: Track your health, fitness, and notifications with the stylish Galaxy Watch 5. Long battery life and water resistance included.

products.name: Apple Watch SE
products.description: Affordable and powerful, the Apple Watch SE offers essential features like heart rate tracking and fitness monitoring.

products.name: Logitech MX Master 3
products.description: A productivity beast, the MX Master 3 offers precision, comfort, and customizable buttons. Great for coders and designers.

products.name: Anker Power Bank 20K
products.description: Never run out of power with this 20,000mAh Anker power bank. Dual output for charging multiple devices on the go.

products.name: Canon EOS R10
products.description: Capture sharp and vivid photos with the Canon EOS R10. Lightweight mirrorless design with high-speed autofocus.

products.name: Sony ZV-E10
products.description: Tailored for vloggers, the Sony ZV-E10 delivers top-quality 4K video and interchangeable lens flexibility in a compact build.

products.name: Nikon Z30
products.description: Compact and beginner-friendly, the Nikon Z30 is great for content creators. Delivers sharp video and smooth performance.

products.name: Fujifilm X-S10
products.description: Fujifilm X-S10 combines retro style with modern tech. Ideal for hybrid shooters who want quality and creative control.

favorites.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
favorites.description: Sleek and powerful, the Galaxy S23 comes with a top-tier Snapdragon processor and ultra-clear AMOLED screen. Ideal for gaming and photography.
